@please_set_server_address: Please go to the settings and configure the server address
@dialog_title_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
@dialog_title_delete_theme: Are you sure you want to delete this theme?
@dialog_title_delete_color: Are you sure you want to delete this color?
@dialog_title_remove_user: Are you sure you want to remove this user from the device?

@dialog_title_delete_selected_photos: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these photos?
@dialog_title_delete_album: Are you sure you want to delete this album?
@dialog_title_remove_photos_from_album: Are you sure you want to remove these photos from the album?

@no_photos_album: No photos in this album yet
update_alert_text: A new version is available. Update now?
server_update_message: New server version available. Update recommended.
